TypeTeamMember.biography: Josh is the Vice President of Talent Acquisition at Triplelift. Josh has a demonstrated history of building processes and driving recruitment to successfully achieve aggressive hiring goals for fast paced tech startups by building effective, scalable, metrics driven recruitment teams. With 12+ years of managing a Talent Acquisition function Josh’s specialties include strengthening a company’s ability to effectively recruit, interview, hire, and manage the financial model of personnel. Josh’s change management skills help to improve and add strategic HR value to the business.
